channel.title: CVE Feed for PWR Plugins -- Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PWR Plugins -- Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio

item.title: CVE-2024-22150|2024-08-01T22:35:34.928Z -- pwr%20plugins -- portfolio%20%26%20image%20gallery%20for%20wordpress%20%7C%20powerfolio
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PWR Plugins Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio: from n/a through 3.1.
